title: BERTHOLD 1200 cps
content:
Does anybody still use these Photo-typesetting machines?  
I have over 120 different Glass Type face grids - are they of any value.  
Worked the 1200cps for many years in the 80’s great machines.  
Also worked a Berthold Diatype - that’s a different matter - what a headache!!

 [‹ Studying Design Abroad](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121402/http:/typophile.com/node/31565 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need some help choosing a font. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121402/http:/typophile.com/node/31772 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ChrisE

comments.content: Take some photos for us young’uns who have never seen this great stuff. [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121402/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Erik%252BSpiekermann) also talks about his Diatype days like a war veteran.
